ygData.subject: Sealed poison vials
ygData.msgSnippet: I have been making the two poison vials for a while now building up my skill, I have made lined poison vials but they are getting to the point I get very
ygData.messageBody:
I have been making the two poison vials for a while now building up my
skill, I have made lined poison vials but they are getting to the point I
get very little training on them. I moved to sealed Poison vials, and the
recipe seems to have changed. I used: one water, one sealed poison vial
sketch, one small block of clay, and a zombie skin, combine, and this did
not work.

I have used Zombie skins for all the other vials so it should work, do I
need a cork or something for the 'Sealed' part?

Dass Swiftruner
Cazic-Thul
